content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Automation Science Pack Production Setup
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(x=8.5, y=13.5)
- Iron gear input system:
  - Burner inserter at position(x=8.5, y=11.5)
  - Wooden chest at position(x=8.5, y=10.5)
- Copper plate input system:
  - Burner inserter at position(x=6.5, y=13.5)
  - Wooden chest at position(x=6.5, y=14.5)
- Output system:
  - Burner inserter at position(x=10.5, y=13.5)
  - Wooden chest at position(x=11.5, y=13.5)

### Mining and Smelting Operations
Multiple mining and smelting setups:
1. First setup:
   - Burner mining drill at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
   - Wooden chest at position(x=41.5, y=-80.5)
   - Burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-79.5)

2. Second setup:
   - Burner mining drill at position(x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
   - Wooden chest at position(x=-27.5, y=-59.5)
   - Burner inserter at position(x=-26.5, y=-59.5)
   - Stone furnace at position(x=-25.0, y=-59.0)
   - Output inserter at position(x=-23.5, y=-58.5)
   - Output chest at position(x=-22.5, y=-58.5)

3. Third setup:
   - Burner mining drill at position(x=-18.0, y=-53.0)
   - Wooden chest at position(x=-17.5, y=-51.5)
   - Burner inserter at position(x=-16.5, y=-51.5)
   - Stone furnace at position(x=-15.0, y=-51.0)
   - Output inserter at position(x=-13.5, y=-50.5)
   - Output chest at position(x=-12.5, y=-50.5)

### Power Generation System
- Steam engine at position(x=-4.5, y=12.5)
- Boiler at position(x=-4.5, y=16.0)
- Offshore pump at position(x=-3.5, y=27.5)
- Connected by multiple pipe groups and electricity poles

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Conflicts
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones at a position
- When placing entities next to each other, ensure proper spacing and direction to avoid conflicts with:
  - Transport belts
  - Electric poles
  - Existing inserters

### Resource Management
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting to insert them into chests
- Verify fuel availability for burner entities
- Check for required ingredients before starting production

### Power System Issues
- Ensure proper connections between power generating entities and consumers
- Verify fluid connections for steam engine and boiler setup

### Production Setup
- When setting up automation, ensure all input and output systems are properly positioned and connected
- Verify chest placements have adequate space for inserter access
- Consider the entire production chain layout before placing individual components
